short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly grabs XKCD of the day and displays it! :)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a button to your browser, that when clicked loads the most recent XKCD comic as well as the hover text.
There is also now a download button, which allows you to download the comic right from the extension!

This extension is open source (although trivial in nature)
https://github.com/DomThePorcupine/EasyXKCD
